Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan clean swept the one-day international (ODI) series 3-0 against hosts Zimbabwe after winning the third and final ODI on Thursday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rashid Khan (AFG) could be named as the captain of your ZIM vs AFG Dream11 Fantasy Team, whereas Hazratullah Zazai (AFG) could be selected as the Vice-captain.
Others: Zimbabwe will be looking to recover from the loss at home ground and make every effort to win the upcoming T20 series, while Afghanistan on the other hand will be eyeing another series win to end their tour on a positive note.
